colorspace: Selectable between sRGB and Adobe RGB
exposurecontrol: Scene Intelligent Auto Program AE (shiftable) Shutter-priority AE (Safety shift possible) Aperture-priority AE (Safety shift possible) Manual exposure Bulb Custom shooting mode C1, C2, C3
weight: Based on CIPA standard: Approx. 32.10 oz. Body Only: Approx. 28.92 oz.
exposurecompensation: Manual: +/-5 stops in 1/3-or 1/2-stop increments AEB: +/-3 stops in 1/3-or 1/2-stop increments
mirror: Quick-return half mirror (transmission: reflection ratio of 40:60)
imagetype: JPEG, RAW (14-bit, Canon original), sRAW, mRAW, RAW+JPEG
shutterspeed: 1/8000 to 30 sec., bulb (Total shutter speed range. Available range varies by shooting mode.) X-sync at 1/250 sec.
drivemodes: Single, High-speed continuous, Low-speed continuous shooting, Silent single shooting, Silent continuous shooting, 10-sec self-timer/remote control, 2-sec. self-timer/remote control
aelock: Auto AE lock *In the One-Shot AF mode with evaluative metering, AE lock takes effect when focus is achieved. Manual AE lock *With AE lock button. (AE lock is updated each time you press the button.) Enabled in all metering modes.
dustcleaningsystem: Self Cleaning Sensor Unit * Removes dust adhering to the low-pass filter. * Self-cleaning executed automatically (taking approx. 3 sec.) when power is turned on or off. Manual execution also possible (taking approx. 7 sec.). * Low-pass filter has a fluorine coating. Dust Delete Data acquisition and appending * The coordinates of the dust adhering to the low-pass filter are detected by a test shot and appended to subsequent images. * The dust coordinate data appended to the image is used by the EOS software to automatically erase the dust spots. Manual cleaning
continuousshootingspeed: High-speed: Maximum approx. 10.0 fps (Maximum approx. 9.5 fps with EOS iTR AF) *At 1/1000 sec. or faster shutter speed, and at the maximum aperture (varies depending on the lens) Low-speed: Approx. 3 fps (default setting) Silent continuous shooting: Maximum approx. 4.0 fps
focusingscreen: Eh-A Standard Focusing Screen Eh-S Super Precision Matte
coverage: Approx. 100% vertically and horizontally (with eye point approx. 22mm eyepoint)
focustype: TTL secondary image-forming phase-difference detection system with AF-dedicated CMOS sensor
movieformat: MOV (Image data: H.264, Audio: Linear PCM), MP4 (Image data: H.264, Audio: AAC)
afassistbeam: Enable Disable Enable external flash only IR AF assist beam only
brightnessadjustment: Auto: Brightness adjusted automatically by the light sensor (Darker/ Standard/Brighter) Manual: 7
externalflash: E-TTL II autoflash with all EX Series Speedlites
eyepoint: Approx. 22mm (At -1m-1 from the eyepiece lens center)
shuttertype: Vertical-travel, mechanical, focal-plane shutter with all speeds electronically-controlled
compatiblelenses: Canon EF lenses including EF-S lenses (35mm-equivalent focal length is approx. 1.6x the lens focal length)
viewfinderinformation: AF Point Information Spot Metering Circle Electronic Level Grid Shooting Mode White Balance Drive Mode Focusing Modes Metering Modes JPEG/RAW Flicker Detection AF Status Indicator Warning Symbol
fileformat: Design Rule for Camera File System 2.0 and Exif 2.3
resolution: Large: Approx. 20.00 Megapixels (5472 x 3648) Medium: Approx. 8.90 Megapixels (3648 x 2432) S1 (Small 1): Approx. 5.00 Megapixels (2736 x 1824) S2 (Small 2): Approx. 2.50 Megapixels (1920 x 1280) S3 (Small 3): Approx. 350,000 pixels (720 x 480) RAW: Approx. 20.00 Megapixels (5472 x 3648) M-RAW: Approx. 11.20 Megapixels (4104 x 2736) S-RAW: Approx. 5.00 Megapixels (2736 x 1824)
focusingmodes: Autofocus: One-Shot AF Predictive AI Servo AF (AI Servo AF III) AI Focus AF Switches between One-Shot AF and AI Servo AF automatically Manual Focus
